author: mturk
msg: Use thread locking to ensure thread-safetyness in OpenSSL.

author: mturk
msg: Fix checking for return value from Poll.poll. Now when the native is
fixed the correct value is returned in case of timeup. Also reset the
addCount if the poller is recycled.

author: markt
msg: New input filter used to insert the request body.

author: markt
msg: Use new maxSavePostSize attribute rather than maxPostSize to control size of POST buffered during SSL handshake.

author: mturk
msg: Do not call ENGINE_free is not initialized.
